title: Can Astana Survive in the Post-Cavendish Era? Team Pins Hopes on New Performance Crew
content:
Astana-Qazaqstan signs retired TT ace Alex Dowsett and three more performance staff for 2025 as it fights for survival without its lead sprinter.

Read the full article at Can Astana Survive in the Post-Cavendish Era? Team Pins Hopes on New Performance Crew on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
